channel.title: us on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in us on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-11
item.description: Moxie Marlinspike steps down as CEO of Signal (2 minute read) Moxie Marlinspike is stepping down as CEO of Signal, leaving executive chairman Brian Acton to serve as acting CEO until a replacement is found.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-10
item.description: WhatsApp Launches Instant Cryptocurrency Payments in the US (2 minute read) WhatsApp has launched a cryptocurrency payment feature with Novi integration for a limited number of users in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers’ accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-10
item.description: Elon Muskâ€™s SpaceX is literally launching a Dogecoin-funded satellite to the Moon (2 minute read) SpaceX is now accepting Dogecoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-09
item.description: SpaceX moves to beam Starlink internet into cars, boats, and aircraft (3 minute read) SpaceX is seeking regulatory approval to connect its Starlink network to cars, trucks, shipping boats, and aircraft.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-17
item.description: Amazon wants to scan your body to make perfectly fitting shirts (2 minute read) Amazon recently unveiled a brand called ‘Made for You’ that makes custom-fitted clothes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-30
item.description: Tesla owners are going to be able to remotely view what their Autopilot cameras can see (3 minute read) Tesla owners will be able to see through their Autopilot cameras in the new update that is likely to be pushed out around the holidays.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-25
item.description: Amazon announces new cloud gaming service called Luna (3 minute read) Amazon has announced a new cloud gaming platform called Luna.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-21
item.description: Lucid beats Tesla Model S Plaid prototype on racetrack with its own tri-motor Air test vehicle (2 minute read) Lucid has beaten the Tesla Model S Plaid prototype’s Laguna Seca race track record with its Air electric vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-15
item.description: Facebook leak reveals Oculus Quest 2 as a 4K standalone VR headset (2 minute read) Facebook is expected to unveil the Oculus Quest 2 at the Facebook Connect conference later this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-03
item.description: ByteDance and Microsoft deal for TikTok to stay in the U.
